thread.title: Look: Austin restaurant takes parting shot at former Texas AD Steve Patterson
thread.title_full: Look: Austin restaurant takes parting shot at former Texas AD Steve Patterson | Dallas Morning News

author: Nick Castillo
title: Look: Austin restaurant takes parting shot at former Texas AD Steve Patterson
text:
El Arroyo, an Austin restaurant known for its witty signs, took a parting shot at Longhorn AD Steve Patterson who resigned Tuesday.
Haha. Well played El Arroyo pic.twitter.com/7mk9YZEldL
â€” Rod Babers (@rodbabers) September 16, 2015 The sign read "Steve Patterson we have a seat here for you that'll be $75." A shot at Patterson who raised ticket prices around Darrell K. Royal - Texas Memorial Stadium.
El Arroyo has been putting funny messages on its signs for years. Austin Business Journal said El Arroyo's "low-tech black lettered sign in front of El Arroyo restaurant on West Fifth Street downtown is probably more effective than any I-35 billboard or banner plane during a University of Texas football game."
